Notes: Vanished Smyrna photos, bound volumes of the Smyrna Herald and Neighbor newspapers,1958 to the present, National Genealogical Society microfiche, 1912-1989, U.S. census microfilm for Cobb county, 1840-1910, county histories, memorabilia and artifacts, and a small research library.  Video and audio tapes of oral histories; family histories, Metropolitan and Smyrna telephone directories dating to the 1950's; also, miscellaneous telephone directories from around the United States.
